content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or opinions, but I can tell you about Hinder's discography. Hinder has released six studio albums to date:

1. Extreme Behavior (2005)
2. Take It to the Limit (2008)
3. All American Nightmare (2010)
4. Welcome to the Freakshow (2012)
5. When the Smoke Clears (2015)
6. The Reign (2017)

Each album showcases Hinder's evolution and growth as a band with different variations in their sound. Extreme Behavior is considered by many as their breakthrough album and the one that established their signature sound. Take It to the Limit marked a more polished and refined sound for the band, while All American Nightmare went back to their roots with a heavier, party-oriented sound. Welcome to the Freakshow showcased the band's ability to experiment with different styles, including electronic and hip-hop influences, whileWhen the Smoke Clears was a mature and reflective album. The Reign achieved more success in the modern rock genre, with the help of their single "Remember Me".
